title: Influenza News
author: Reuters Health Information; January
description: Read full-text medical journal articles from Medscape's Influenza News.
cleaned_text: Influenza News - [Antivirals Underused for Children Hospitalized With Influenza](//www.medscape.com/s/viewarticle/874869) - [Cleveland Clinic Wellness Doctor Backs Off Antivaccine Column](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/874207) - [News Quiz: Top Pediatrics Stories From 2016](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/873297) - [Viruses May Treat Women More Leniently Than Men](//www.medscape.com/s/viewarticle/873313) - [Diabetes Patients Vary in Uptake of Flu and Other Vaccines](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/873222) - Alert [US Life Expectancy Drops for First Time Since 1999](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/873051) - [No Link Between Autism and Flu Vaccination During Pregnancy](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/872528) - [US Infectious Disease Mortality Stable From 1980 to 2014](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/872240) - Alert [FDA Expands Quadrivalent Flu Vaccine (FluLaval) Use to Infants](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/872170) - [CDC's ACIP Fine-Tunes Vaccine Schedule for Children and Teens](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/870764) - [Adult Vaccine Avoidance Cost $7 Billion in 2015](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/870362) Alert [FDA Approves Flublok Quadrivalent Flu Vaccine](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/870201) - [Kids Who Get Some Forms of CAM Less Likely to Get Flu Shot](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/869680) - Alert [Will Lack of Nasal Spray Flu Vaccine Cut Immunization Rate?](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/869537) - [Influenza Circulating in New Hampshire, 2016-2017](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/869467) - [Swine Flu Vaccine Safe in Early Pregnancy](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/869066) - [AAP: Flu Shot, Not Nasal Spray, Recommended for 2016-2017](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/868420) - ISIRV [Speeding the Pace of Influenza Vaccine Development](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/868375) - [Physicians Struggle With Ethics of Barring Vaccine Refusers](//www.medscape.com/viewarticle/868353) - ISIRV
